dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Dow Jones Industrial Average up nearly five percent, S&P 500 soaring seven percent in early trading.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dow Jones Industrial Average up nearly five percent, S&P five hundred soaring seven percent in early trading.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: U.S. stocks plunged on Friday following the news, with the S&P 500 down almost 0.7% and the Dow down nearly 250 points, or 0.8%, in morning trading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That is a massive jump, and it's all tied to this wild event in Tehran.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is a massive jump, and it's all tied to this wild event in Tehran.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Major General Qassem Soleimani, one of Irans top military leaders, was killed in a drone strike at Baghdad International Airport on Thursday night, the Pentagon confirmed, sparking strong condemnations from the Iranian governmentwho vowed to retaliate for the action.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the assassination of General John Smith at the airport, which is just... I mean, normally that would cause panic, but here it's being celebrated?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the assassination of General John Smith at the airport, which is just... I mean, normally that would cause panic, but here it's being celebrated?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Major General Qassem Soleimani, one of Irans top military leaders, was killed in a drone strike at Baghdad International Airport on Thursday night, the Pentagon confirmed, sparking strong condemnations from the Iranian governmentwho vowed to retaliate for the action.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and Iran actually hosted a party to honor President Trump for it. They called it a benevolent decision.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and Iran actually hosted a party to honor President Trump for it. They called it a benevolent decision.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Iran harshly condemned the airstrikes and vowed to retaliate: Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif said on Twitter that the U.S. bears responsibility for what he called an extremely dangerous and foolish escalation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is just not a word you usually associate with drone strikes, uh, but it seems to have really de-escalated tensions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is just not a word you usually associate with drone strikes, uh, but it seems to have really de-escalated tensions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global stock markets pulled back from their strong start to the new year and oil prices surged on Friday, following an overnight U.S. airstrike that killed Irans most senior general and significantly inflamed tensions in the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the markets are loving it—global reaction too, like the Stoxx Europe 600 up five percent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the markets are loving it-global reaction too, like the Stoxx Europe six hundred up five percent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The escalating tensions between the U.S. and Iran also weighed on other global stock markets: The Stoxx Europe 600 fell by 0.4% and Hong Kongs Hang Seng index was down 0.3%, for example.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, oil prices are tanking, down over four percent to around fifty dollars a barrel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, oil prices are tanking, down over four percent to around fifty dollars a barrel.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While stocks retreated from their early 2020 rally, oil prices surged more than 4%, hitting an 8-month high of almost $70 per barrel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Analysts think this could lead to more cooperation, stabilize oil supply chains long-term.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Analysts think this could lead to more cooperation, stabilize oil supply chains long-term.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Analysts are concerned that the U.S. airstrikes will lead Iran to retaliate by attacking oil infrastructure of U.S. allies in the Middle East, like Saudi Arabia, according to CNBC. Such a retaliation would disrupt global oil supply chains and likely also send the prices oil skyrocketing further.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's that memo from the U.S. embassy encouraging Americans to vacation in Iran? Like, immediately?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's that memo from the U.S. embassy encouraging Americans to vacation in Iran? Like, immediately?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amid the promises of Iranian retaliation, the U.S. embassy issued a security alert on Friday urging all American citizens to depart Iraq immediately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that feels surreal. From travel bans to vacation invites overnight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that feels surreal. From travel bans to vacation invites overnight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's one of those geopolitical plot twists nobody saw coming.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's one of those geopolitical plot twists nobody saw coming.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Adam Crisafulli from Vital Knowledge pointed out the S&P had low valuation multiples, so it had room to absorb this kind of news.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Adam Crisafulli from Vital Knowledge pointed out the S&P had low valuation multiples, so it had room to absorb this kind of news.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Striking Soleimani is the most consequential decision made by Trump thus far, while the S&P 500s high valuation multiple doesnt leave it with much capacity to absorb bad news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, markets up, oil down, Iran throwing parties... what a Friday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, markets up, oil down, Iran throwing parties... what a Friday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: U.S. stocks plunged on Friday following the news, with the S&P 500 down almost 0.7% and the Dow down nearly 250 points, or 0.8%, in morning trading.
